name: Scary Ghost House 3D
description:
Do you love to explore different haunted places? Then let’s play this game and enjoy this haunted adventure!
Scary Ghost house 3D is about a house which is inhabited by scary ghosts and dreadful skeletons. This house is full of mysteries. You have to enter into this house. But be alert, Scary ghost are active and ready to catch you.
Don’t be scare from weird sounds. Don’t let your fright beat you. You must complete every mission without getting trapped and within allocated time.
Let’s use your wits to escape and solve the puzzles of this haunted castle!

Scary Ghost House 3D Features includes:
Different Rooms and Mysteries to solve!
Challenging Missions!
Smooth and Easy Controls!
Fun Filled Game!
Hints and Clues!
